titleStmt.title: A short, yet sound commentarie; written on that woorthie worke called; the Prouerbes of Salomon and now published for the profite of Gods people.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Orwin, for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: T.W., i.e. Thomas Wilcox.
Running title reads: An exposition vpon the Prouerbes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
